snippet: BRAUN--Phyllis Thurlow Chase, 98, died July 3, 2016. Predeceased by husband Seymour Braun (1923-1986) and three brothers. Retired as editor of Scholastic's Arrow Book Club in 1985 after 42 years in publishing industry. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: BRAUN--Phyllis Thurlow Chase, 98, died July 3, 2016. Predeceased by husband Seymour Braun (1923-1986) and three brothers. Retired as editor of Scholastic's Arrow Book Club in 1985 after 42 years in publishing industry. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BRAUN, PHYLLIS THURLOW CHASE
